short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Nifty extension to quickly preview UWFlow rating of a course by hovering over course listing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows user to easily preview a course's UWFlow info on the undergraduate calendar pages. Hover over a course link to see its description and UWFlow ratings and access the UWFlow page by clicking the course name in the popup element. 

Note: Some design elements have been inspired by UWFlow+ by Matt Dsouza, which has since deprecated and is no longer working.
